title: Establish mock data for Lattice Coach
description: Create initial mock data for internal and external sources to support development and testing.

title: Add intelligent routing for assistant responses
description: Implement routing to determine the best response path based on user input and data context.

title: Spin up Lattice Coach repository
description: Set up the foundational repository for the Lattice Coach project, including initial configuration.

title: Add tests for mock data validation
description: Write and execute tests to validate the mock data structure and content.

title: Add synthesis nodes to aggregate data sources
description: Develop synthesis nodes to combine data from multiple sources into actionable responses.

title: Integrate GitHub data into synthesis nodes
description: Fetch and process GitHub data, including PRs and reviews, for aggregation in synthesis nodes.

title: Integrate Jira data into synthesis nodes
description: Fetch and process Jira ticket data, including statuses and history, for aggregation in synthesis nodes.

title: Generate Loom demo for Hackweek
description: Create a Loom video demonstrating Lattice Coachâ€™s current capabilities for Hackweek.

title: Add feedback synthesis from internal data
description: Aggregate user feedback data to generate actionable recommendations.

title: Add UI for assistant suggestions
description: Design and implement a UI to display assistant suggestions in an actionable manner.

title: Optimize synthesis node performance
description: Improve the efficiency of synthesis nodes to handle large data sets in real time.

title: Fetch PTO data for synthesis nodes
description: Retrieve and process PTO data for integration into synthesis nodes.

title: Integrate Slack notifications for assistant updates
description: Enable Slack notifications for users to receive real-time updates from the assistant.

title: Design prompts for assistant conversation flows
description: Create engaging and effective prompts for Lattice Coach conversations.

title: Add competency matrix integration
description: Integrate competency matrix data into synthesis nodes for role-based recommendations.

title: Implement context-aware suggestions
description: Develop functionality for suggestions based on user activity and context.

title: Review assistant API endpoints
description: Conduct a review of API endpoints for assistant data retrieval and response.

title: Set up local development environment
description: Prepare the local environment for efficient Lattice Coach development.

title: Draft documentation for synthesis nodes
description: Write initial documentation for the synthesis node functionality.

title: Test assistant recommendations with mock data
description: Validate the accuracy of assistant recommendations using mock data scenarios.

title: [Tech Debt] Refactor synthesis node infrastructure
description: Update the synthesis node architecture to handle large-scale data processing efficiently. This task is essential to address existing technical debt that impacts performance and scalability.

title: [Tech Debt] Standardize API response structures
description: Ensure consistency across internal APIs to simplify integration with external data sources. This task focuses on resolving technical debt related to inconsistent API formats.

title: [Tech Debt] Resolve performance bottlenecks in data retrieval
description: Optimize queries for internal data retrieval to reduce latency in Lattice Coach operations. Addressing this technical debt is critical for real-time data synthesis.

title: [Tech Debt] Update outdated dependency versions
description: Bring all backend and frontend dependencies up to date to avoid security and compatibility issues. This task addresses technical debt by modernizing the tech stack.

title: [Tech Debt] Improve test coverage for existing features
description: Add unit and integration tests to cover current functionality and ensure future compatibility. Resolves technical debt by increasing reliability and maintainability of the codebase.
